website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a chip without any preservatives, try this sea-salted option.
pros: A potato chip choice Frito-Lay created for the health conscious
Sea salt flavor tastes light and flavorful
cons: Not as widely distributed as other Frito-Lay brand potato chips

customer_reviews.title: Misleading marketing practice
customer_reviews.text: The description of these products is a bit misleading because ONLY the Dorito's were Organic. The (4) other brands of snacks that were sold in this box of (36) snacks were NOT ORGANIC and in addition the two varieties of Cheetos products were not even NON-GMO.Very disappointed and will not order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Ordered the variety box. Received and opened - and it contained ALL smartfood salted popcorn. If I only wanted one flavor - one item - that’s what I would have ordered. So disappointed. NOT WHAT I PAID FOR.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Might not be what your ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this listing twice now. First time I got a box of cheetos and doritos, just as I ordered. Second time I got a mix of cheetos, doritos, barbeque, and regular chips! I'm not returning them because I can eat them and it's not worth the effort to return. To those of you who are considering buying this: you may get a random mix of snack packs instead of just cheetos and doritos as the listing advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Close to expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on July 18 and was happy with them until I realized that the Doritos White Cheddar had an expiration date of Aug. 27. I wouldn't have even noticed, except when I cracked one open to eat today (Sept. 5), I discovered the chips are very stale. I'll probably order again but just be prepared to eat them all within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Crunched
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips so much and was thrilled to find them on here since they don't sell them at my grocery store anymore. However, more than half the bags are entirely smooshed flat and inedible. Update: Forgot to cancel my subscription and received another box. They were not smooshed like the fist box and are delicious. Guess that's just chance. Only complaint is the way-too-soon expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: How does one eat 36 bags of snacks in 1 week? Bad expiration date
customer_reviews.text: Expiration date for this product was about one week after it arrived. Not fresh inventory! Buyer Beware! Lays must be moving old inventory.
customer_reviews.author: KEn

customer_reviews.title: Not as described and outdated a few weeks after received
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these before and was very happy with them. However, the last box was received at the end of December and had a January 29th. Not only that, but instead of being all Baked Cheetos and Doritos, the box had the BBQ chips which I don't like and the regular chips. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but expire in 6 days from receiving.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal but they expire on May 21, 2019 and we just received them today. We won’t be ordering again. We can’t eat 36 bags of chips that fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D.

customer_reviews.title: Low guilt salty snack
customer_reviews.text: OK, it's still a bag of chips. But it could be worse. The flavors are not as potent as the originals, so it may not cure your salty craving. But, I'm always happy when I find a bag in my desk or glove box. I also find the flavor not to be true to the originals - good, but not the same. If you found this review HELPFUL, please click the button below. THX!
customer_reviews.author: 1PickyWoman😋

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snacks - small size
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure: these bags are smaller than the standard 1 oz serving size. Nowhere in the product description does it state this. The chips and cheetos are 7/8 oz, and the popcorn is 1/2 oz. If you zoom WAY in on the pictures and put your reading glasses on, you'll see the sizes. I feel like that's a little deceptive. The snacks are tasty, but I won't buy these sizes again. Sidenote: the cheetos are the bomb.com!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of GF Chips
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of Gluten free chips. My niece has celiac disease and can't eat Gluten. These are a nice snack that she can eat since they are gluten free. I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Healthier Options
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these chips for my kids lunches and snacks. I believe in portion control and moderation. I also like simple ingredients and great taste. These chips meet both of those standards. I was buying them much cheaper at the local Sam’s club until they were no longer being offered. This online option is much more expensive. However, if you are looking for this type of option, you are hard pressed to find other options in the store. I would repurchase and recommend. Note: our least favorite flavor is the bbq potato chips. They have an ok flavor, but leave a little after taste. I still eat them.
customer_reviews.author: MsT

customer_reviews.title: good value - short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Good value if you go through a lot of chips. I've bought this several times and every time the expiration date is within about a month. If you will go through the box in a few weeks time it is a good value. I have not been able to find the thick cut natural sea cut chips in individual bags locally and it is a much better price than the larger bags available at the store plus I like that the individual bags serve as portion control. The flavor does get noticeably off rather quickly once it hits the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Not all of these are organic
customer_reviews.text: Not all of these are organic. They have some ingredients that are organic. The potato chips are not organic and the extra crunchy cheetos are not organic corn meal. Potatoes are grown with a massive amount of pesticides. Non organic corn is almost always genetically modified to be able to handle large amounts of pesticides. All in all it speaks to the integrity of frito lay as a company. The expiration dates on the packages that actually have them are this coming Tues. Can't eat 36 packages by Tues and wouldn't want to. I am very disappointed in this offering and won't be buying anything else from Frito Lay in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightening deals rock
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, I did not consider just how much snack food I was ordering, the price was so excellent and the variety great. I love these smaller packs that hit the spot perfectly for work. The expiration date is sufficient to finish them with a little help from my work team mates. I really liked most of the flavors. The white cheddar crunchy cheetos type and doritos type were excellent. The potato chips are good. I like the flavor in the cheese puffs, but man those suckers get stuck in your teeth. At least without the neon orange you do not look like you need a hazmat suit. Great option.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboyspals

customer_reviews.title: Do not order unless you plan to consume in 3-4 weeks time.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy unless you plan to consume within 4 weeks of delivery. Ordered 3 boxes of snack size bags. The bags of cool ranch Doritos have a “guaranteed fresh until” date of DEC 31, 2019. The bags of nacho cheese Doritos have a “guaranteed fresh until” date of DEC 17, 2019. The bags of simply Lays have a “guaranteed fresh until” date of January 14, 2020 - and the one package opened was stale. The packages were delivered Nov 20, 2019. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Misty Majumder

customer_reviews.title: Expires in 6 days
customer_reviews.text: Order as part of subscribe and save order. Received product on Jan 8 and the Use By Date on the box is Jan 14. The varieties each have a different Use By date; crunchy Cheetos and BBQ Lays was Jan 14, Regular Lays and Doritos was Jan 28 and Cheetos puffs are Mar 24.***edit: replacement ordere came on Jan 11 and the Use By Date on the box is Mar 10...2mos much better than 6 days***
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Snacks/Rodent Ate Through 1 Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I ordered just the Doritos pack and one of the bags had been chewed through and the contents mostly eaten by what appears to be some kind of rodent. See photo. This is unacceptable and disgusting! These snacks are pretty tasty and cheesy (a little saltier than necessary), and I like the portion size of each bag. The bulk amount is perfect for a small family, and I like that the ingredients are a little better than regular Cheetos and Doritos. You get the same crunch and freshness you'd expect, without the weird aftertaste. These were my guilty pleasure for a bit. But I think I'm done now.
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: I love these Simply Cheetos Puffs, but...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it's not what I received. A Snack box from Amazon was delivered yesterday, unopened until just now. Instead of Simply Cheetos Puffs White Cheddar Cheese Flavored Snacks, I received Smartfood Smart 50 White Cheddar popcorn. Normally, I'd try to return, exchange, whatever....but coincidentally, my husband likes Smartfood popcorn. So we're keeping them. (Yes, I did check to see if he ordered these...nope, just a mistake on Amazon's part, one that worked in my husband's favor, but left me wanting my cheese puffs 😞) I immediately reordered the Simply Cheetos Puffs ...with my fingers crossed that I get them this time 🤞
customer_reviews.author: L. A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Yumilicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are so darn good!! I love being able to get individual portion sizes (which are actually large enough to share with someone, if you're feeling generous) especially in the humid summer rainy time, when a large bag of these goodies would turn to sog after the first serving. So glad I can get these on Amazon as the little bags are not available in any of my local stores. Also the expiration date is 4 months away which is great, I don't have to feel like I need to hurry to eat them all quickly. (Not that I need any excuse when they're so yummy!)
customer_reviews.author: MommySan

customer_reviews.title: No barbeque and plain chips
customer_reviews.text: I love the white cheddar Doritos and Cheetos. I thought this box was a mix of the two, but my box had sea salt plain chips and barbeque Doritos. I didn't need the plain chips and I dislike the barbeque. I would order again but I don't know what I would get.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret H. Shoup

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Ok. These are the devil. Cheetos without all the processed crud- well mostly. One snack size bag is enough to do the trick and I use my fancy Star Wars chopsticks to avoid the orange-sticky-fanger mess.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Snacks
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant with purchasing these online, especially after reading reviews. The package came when I asked for it, all the bags were packaged well, none that were opened or smashed. The flavors are really good (I haven't seen these flavors anywhere around us so I love being able to order these!) and all 3 of our boys love them. Easy to pack for lunches, take to sports actives, grab on the go. Price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: JPlattinum

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh at all! Well past the best-by date
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived soon after I placed it, but many of the bags turned out to have been it expired or past their best-by date.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nakashian

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and well packed
customer_reviews.text: I have to say after reading everyone saying these were stale I was afraid to open my box that arrived today oh, but that was not the case for me. Second time ordering the simply white cheddar Cheetos and happy. My first order was also in good condition and not stale. These expire in November 2019 which is not a problem since we pretty much eat them daily. All in all I can't say anything bad about my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HoneeBee

customer_reviews.title: MY KIDS LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: MY TEENS LOVE THESE CHIPS. ITS HARD TO FIND CHIPS WITH LOW SUGAR/CARBS AND DYES. WE DON'T ANYTHING WITH EAT DYES IN IT AND MY KIDS FIND THESE DELICIOUS. WE ALSO PURCHASED THE VARIETY PACK AS WELL, MULTIPLE TIMES.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Super Tasty and NOT a Genetic Time Bomb
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, crunch and value. Awesome that it’s NGMO. There have been studies linking GMO corn to many cancers, in the folks who eat them and more so in subsequent generations. Of course people aren’t nice - but given the risk, do you really want to be an unpaid test subject for corn-growers. NON-GMO may cost a few more cents, but could save you and your family terrible, life-destroying consequences. PLUS - these are as good or better than the “regular” type...and when did regular become the modified version?? That is not even logical!
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and freshness.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to give out as team snacks. They are all packed with flavor and were fresh. The expiration on these was 2 months out from the date of purchase and each pack was fresh. All the team kids came for seconds after tasting them! These snacks are never a nutritional substitute but at least they don’t have too many artificial additives. Will buy again. Liked the taste of Doritos and cheese puffs. I was never a fan of barbecue flavored chips so can’t compare but by themselves they are good. Finally I don’t cringe when kids beg for Doritos!
customer_reviews.author: AmFan

customer_reviews.title: my favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and I love the Simply line of products....these are my favorites. I love having individual sized bags and its just the right amount. Love that the white cheddar doesn't stain your fingers or clothes like the original orange! I have repurchased and will continue to do so. I love that I can buy a whole box of JUST this kind.
customer_reviews.author: kcmommy03

customer_reviews.title: Kind of stale
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love these organic Doritos, they’re my absolute favorite, however the ones in this pack tasted very stale. They’re still edible I guess, but definitely not the freshest. They weren’t expired when I received them, but the best by date was up in 2 weeks. The Cheetos were fine, but now I’m stuck with a lot of little bags of not so great Doritos. I probably won’t be ordering these again :(
customer_reviews.author: MaraJade77

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again
customer_reviews.text: I never threw away a chip before I tasted this. I would crunch them into recipes or something. These were so tasteless that I threw the first chip away after a nibble. The package says "real cheese" and with that really high salt content I expected to see a bit of cheese but there was none. How the calories were so high when there were so few and flavorless chips is beyond me... I can't even give them away.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Single serve portioned yum
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these snacks. They are great to add to his lunch or take with us for a snack on-the-go. I like that they are organic. These Doritos do not have msg in the ingredients; regular ones do. These are a healthier alternative! UPDATED: I just noticed the expedition date December 17, 2019 I purchased these 11 days prior. Ridiculous! Can’t eat the entire case that quickly. Dropped to 3 stars because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: "Best By" date for product received is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: This is the last time I am ordering my snacks from Amazon. The prices are good, but the "Best Buy" dates have consistently been within 8-10 weeks from the date received. I know for a fact the manufacturers package these with dates that are much further out. I will give Target or Walmart my business with these items.
customer_reviews.author: SoonToBeExCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great but few come open, and inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: These are great, however usually the Doritos often come open 😡 Also they’ve been inconsistent, sometimes it’s missing one type of bag and doubled up on anther type... I still have it ok subscribe and save but debating about kicking it. To many Cheetos puffs for my liking. Usually feed em to my rotti. These small bags are great though, keeps me from eating half a big bag at one sitting. Except I usually have two of these small bags at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Chips were old.
customer_reviews.text: I received a box of chips that were already 2 weeks passed the “guaranteed fresh date.” They tasted okay, but expect fresher product. We had these ordered on a subscription and this is the second time this is happened!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cusick

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find, perfect for lunches/portion control
customer_reviews.text: Two shipments have arrived either expired or within days of expiration. Amazon needs to rotate their stock and check before shipment. However. I like these chips and they are hard to find in the single serve packaging. This is a good price when you use subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: tjrb

customer_reviews.title: I like these more than regular Cheetos, but discontinued product so slightly out of date
customer_reviews.text: I like classic crispy Cheetos but I like this type even better (I don't care for the "puffed" kind). Evidently, this product has been discontinued, I never saw it in a grocery store. Mine were slightly out of date but I didn't care, they tasted fine anyway (maybe a but harder and crunchier?). I will buy these again, for as long as they remain available.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jensen

customer_reviews.title: So happy you sell organic gluten free chips
customer_reviews.text: Growing up in the 70s and 80s I always loved chips especially Doritos. Then about 15 years ago they started adding preservatives like MSG which I'm allergic to. Thank you Amazon for offering organic gluten free chips and doritos and all my favorites . Now I can enjoy. I ordered 2 boxes this week. All for me. Yes I will have to be disciplined eating them all. But it is Heaven in my mouth. Thank You Amazon and thank the co that makes it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, multi flavor and fresh.
customer_reviews.text: Fresh and long time till expiry date. Packaged well and smaller amounts in multiple flavor is always best to offer kids. That way they don't get filled up with it, and you have more control on the amount. We all grew up with these delicious stuff, definitely they are handy to keep them around for snack times or trips to have it in a bag or in your car.
customer_reviews.author: yalch⭐

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and delicious at the same time .
customer_reviews.text: I gave up doritos 5 years ago because I started to care about what I put in my body . My prayers were answered when frito lay started making organic doritos . You need to remember that us who eat organic food pay a little more , but we are all worth it . Eat good and eat healthy . These organic doritos taste great and the natural chips are also good . Eat cleaner food guys . You are all worth it .
customer_reviews.author: raz

customer_reviews.title: MY HUSBAND MY DOG AND I LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVE THESE AND THEY ARE NOT SALTY TO US I TRIED THESE AND LOVE THEM SO MUCH BUT THEY RE HARD TO FIND AND I WAS OUT ON NIGHT AFTER BIBLE STUDY AND WENT TO GET SOME GAS AND SAW THESE AND I WAS LIKE LET ME TRY THESE..AND I AM SO GLAD THAT I DID AND LIKE I SAID WE ALL LOVE THESE...TRY THEM AND I THINK YOU WILL LOVE THESE AND KNOW WE DID...DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.author: lagirl

customer_reviews.title: NO VARIETY!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Variety pack and received ALL cheddar popcorn. I like popcorn but I didn’t want 36 bags or I would have just ordered popcorn. This is NO variety at all. Not as advertised and I want What I ordered. Not a substitute. People in too much of a hurry to check what the order is supposed to be. Dissatisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: NBDB

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand & price.... not so the delivery
customer_reviews.text: Use this for snacks at home & work..... have it to automatically deliver pretty much every month..... must be pretty popular cause not always delivered when or like I want.... you think those that have these products ordered auto delivered we’d be the priority cause ya know you have an automatic buyer??...??!?!?
customer_reviews.author: Kjnnurpl

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have an eating disorder & this is one of the 'foods' I will allow myself (I like the 'self contained' aspect of them. I think of them more as a calorie number than a 'food'. (140 cal +2g protein). I almost live on these. LOVE the convenience of drop shipping (as opposed to going the store (ugh) & they may or may NOT be in stock (grrrr). So much easier this way! thanks.
customer_reviews.author: W. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy goodness and natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: We had been buying the Baby Gerber cheese doodles, which come in small cans. My toddler loved them, but they aren't the cheapest snack and go stale once the can is opened. I looked into these Cheetos and found that they have similar ingredients as the Baby Gerber, but come in individual bags at a much cheaper cost per serving. My son loves this just as much if not more than the Gerber ones. So long as the price stays where it's been at we will continue to Subscribe and Save for these.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I love these white cheddar cheese puffs however my teenage son does not. He refers to then as little bags of disappointment. This is only because they do not give him the satisfying yellow orange stain on his fingers. Apparently that is part of what makes cheese puffs great. I disagree with him. I am happy to avoid orange fingertips and I love the Tang of the white cheddar.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.title: Nice value, better shipping packaging tho
customer_reviews.text: Didnt realize the bags were so small but I dont mind as it helps with portion control. It's actually the perfect little size to take for work lunch or for the kids lunch/after school snack. I gave it 4 stars because I definitely did not expect to open the amazin box to see bags of chips stuffed everywhere. My pantry is too small and not sure where exactly I'm gonna fit 36 loose bags of chips lol
customer_reviews.author: KitKat2011

customer_reviews.title: Stale product! If you order these, check the date on the packets!
customer_reviews.text: Received my order of Simply Cheetos Puffs & Crunchy on 16 Aug 2020, only to find on opening the box that the packets inside were labelled Best Before 12 July 2020 - over a month earlier. I like the smallish portion size and the ones which aren't expired taste fine, but half the box went to the trash because they had expired.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Bag was open
customer_reviews.text: Well, I thought someone may have been hungry but seeing that the separator looked like it had been smashed into the bag and the air inside made it open, I ate them anyway. Would not recommending ordering chips from the Pantry. They didn't sell them as just one bag unless it was in the Pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Briley

customer_reviews.title: Beware expiration date. : (
customer_reviews.text: All of the Doritos in the box expired a month before the other chips, had to throw a bunch out because of how stale they were.
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: A (slightly) healthier Cheeto option
customer_reviews.text: These are still chips but I feel a bit better giving these to my four kids. They like the flavor just as much as the regular Cheetos. They are good for little kids because they are a softer than regular Cheetos. My only complaint is that their fingers get cheesy powder on them but other than that, they are a good serving size snack!
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: They sent me reg crunchy Cheetos by accident
customer_reviews.text: Rather than complain about getting regular Cheetos rather than the new crunchy white cheddar Cheetos, I just ate a few of these and gave the rest to the food bank so they could have good lunches. I love reg Cheetos anyway, so it wasn't a hardship. Great size and very fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Funky Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Work Snacks
customer_reviews.text: Every bag was fresh and crunchy. Bought to have snacks at work. The box stayed in my car and they were still fresh crunchy and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Tony T

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but didn’t get what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: I love the simply brand chips. Finally companies are waking up and realizing you don’t need to put food dyes in chips (and other things) so people will buy them. However, the box I ordered was short a couple of bags. I paid for 36, but only got 34. Update: I ordered these again. Only got 31 in the box when the description says 36!
customer_reviews.author: J Howard

customer_reviews.title: Expired Chips
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this box for my daughter's goodie bags. Unfortunately those chips were already past the 'Guaranteed Fresh' date. I'm so upset because now I can't use them and I will request for a refund as noone want to eat stale snacks. It's a sad that there was no quality control for items like these.
customer_reviews.author: Vlinder

customer_reviews.title: Best by date was 2 weeks out from purchase date.
customer_reviews.text: Annoyed, expires less than a month from purchase date? I bought in bulk and individually wrapped so they would last a few months, now they are all expired and have almost a full box left. Also, the Doritos are gross, but I’m wondering if they are stale and that’s why they seem so off.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan R

customer_reviews.title: A thankful mother
customer_reviews.text: I have to thank the company for finally making these chips available without the color additive! No worries about the kids getting it all over their fingers and cleaning them off on their clothes. I wouldn't buy several of these flavors of chips for the explicit reason that my children would get it on their clothes and it almost always left stains. My four children have been ecstatic that I have been buying these for their lunches and that they are in our home. Thanks again for the color additives missing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still Cheesy!
customer_reviews.text: Other than perhaps needing a bit more salt which one may add later anyway these are great. Having a Doritos flavour a bit closer to the regular ones would make them more popular at our house but we'll switch back and forth. An added bonus is that the cheeses don't have un-needed colourants that can stain the kiddies clothing or your furniture ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Quesada

customer_reviews.title: Doritos - great! Cheetos - meh.
customer_reviews.text: I do appreciate all that ISN'T in these. The Doritos were very tasty, the Cheetos not so much - they went gummy and sticky in the mouth and no one would eat them. I wouldn't buy these again for that reason, and the fact they are SO expensive - about $1 a bag for a very small serving.
customer_reviews.author: Pcllarsen

customer_reviews.title: Cheetosvare crunchy, and delicious.
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago I discovered Cheetos. I love this product because there are no artificial colors or additives. I could eat a pack every day, I am sad that this product is not currently available on Amazon. If you are listening Amazon please let me know so that I can restock my shelves with my favorite snack!!!
customer_reviews.author: 1SweetLadyv

customer_reviews.title: Flavor variety brings a smile to your tastebuds.
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to other brands of chips that may not be so healthy, not to say these are healthy, but they are packaged in small quantities to appease the taste buds. The size may be a good or bad thing depending on who you are and why you buy these. The four flavors are Cheddar, Barbecue, Classic Lays, and Doritos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: won't be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.text: Out of 36 bags, only two were doritos and only 3 were sea salt (which didn't even taste like sea salt but more like the regi;ar salt used on chips). The majority were barbeque and they didn't even taste that good to me. As far as I"m concerned this product is a rip off and I strongly discourage others from purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: rachelbTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: A nice thick chip that's all natural
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite chip. I like the small packages because I have to limit my carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Probably m mistake but I expected the "fried" version, not the baked. I'd found these white cheddar Cheetos and I'd thought that these were the right ones. But baked, not "regular". So sad. They are merely "ok" while the regular white cheddar Cheetos were quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Durwin Sharp

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot do much salt and these are perfect to give that great potato chip taste but not overdo the salt. Bag size is perfect because once I start eating potato chips I can devour an entire big bag. I order these all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awful
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Simply Cheetos White Cheddar Puff version bought in grocery stores, but these had a queer taste, were stale & short-dated. Amazon most kindly reimbursed me & said no need to return. Brought the whole box to a classroom of oddly-behaved youths the next day and they vanished within minutes. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Shari H.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG...love the Simply Cheetos so much, I first ordered the 10 pack and then ordered the 36 count. ADDICTIVE!! Thank goodness they are in portion controlled packs and very fresh. I hope they will offer the jalapeno in small packs as well as they are AMAZING as well. Helps me with my WW program.
customer_reviews.author: 1sweetGApch

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This was misleading. The Smart 50 indicated 50 calories per bag. When I received it, found those packages were 50 per cup and 70 per bag. And many were 130 or 140 per package. Threw them in the trash rather than consume that many calories
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Harp

customer_reviews.title: STALE
customer_reviews.text: Most of the bags were so close to expiration. Some bags were open and contents spilling. Never buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Suchi Ramakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and favorable
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these and I love that they are a bit healthier. They are nice and fresh and are now part of my subscribe and save. I do wish they were packaged differently though, like maybe a box that allowed you to keep them stored in the pantry and just grab what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kcuret

customer_reviews.title: Tasty low calorie snack
customer_reviews.text: These are really tasty. Low calorie, low carb, crisp and with a good flavor. Also inexpensive for a diet snack. I have bought these twice and will do so again when I start running out. They are a great after dinner or mid afternoon snack that doesn't ruin my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Kelman

customer_reviews.title: Kinda addicative.
customer_reviews.text: A crisp corn taste. White cheddar adds right tangyness with spices enhancing the flavor. Main issue sometime the bags are crumpled, affecting the doritos. Sometimes the spices aren't evenly coated - but happens with all doritos. If looking for a different take on the classic.
customer_reviews.author: NovelaFan A Graceful Season

customer_reviews.title: STALE received one day before expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: Received a case of these on July 13, 2020. I didn't think to look at the date. Today my grandson tells me they taste funny so I tried one, stale! The expiration date on all the packages is July 14, 2020. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cheesy poofs
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo good. I think I’ve eaten about an armoires worth of these in the past few years. My thighs would agree with me. Tastes like mild white cheese and not nearly as salty as regular Cheetos. They have more of a delicate texture than the hard, crunchy texture of traditional Cheetos.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Short expiration dates
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! But only gave two stars because the expiration date on them was only a few weeks out. Who the heck can eat all those bags that quickly???
customer_reviews.author: Kr1sten

customer_reviews.title: Flavor meh
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a try because it was a great deal available through Amazon and don't get me wrong I ate the entire case of them in just a few weeks but the flavor is substantially lacking from a standard Cheeto. I guess that's what you get when you make it healthier
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Too much popcorn, and Doritos are stale
customer_reviews.text: I've subscribe to this variety pack, but I think I'll have to cancel it ongoing....this last shipment had STALE Doritos in it, and those are our favorites. Also, there's just too much popcorn, and not enough of the other flavors in this box.
customer_reviews.author: Ronna Bear

customer_reviews.title: Misleading. Only doritos are organic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a hurry thinking all the bags were organic. Nope, only the doritos. I haven't bought this type stuff in years. I remember them have more flavor. These are really bland and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bri D

customer_reviews.title: Good chips, but not fresh
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these chips several times, but the last order was already a month past the sell-by date when I received them. I ordered the Cheetos on March 14th, but the expiration date on all of the bags was February 25th. So far, I haven't had a bad bag, but don't expect to be able to eat all of these before they start getting stale. I'll probably try to order them again, since they're good chips and a good deal, but hopefully they won't be "expired" already when I receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: Healthier school lunch option
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for 9 yo’s school snacks. She only likes the puffs, chips & Doritos. The popcorn doesn’t have a lot of flavor & is kernel heavy. I eat them as a low cal snack... but not as good quality/taste as skinny pop. Will continue to order because the others are such good options, wish the popcorn tasted better or there was an option without the popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: JSS

customer_reviews.title: Large shipment - many stale packages
customer_reviews.text: Flavor excellent. out of 36 packages 13 were stale. Check dates all were same Feb 2020. Noticed the stale packages seem to be flatten probably a pin hole in the package causing product to go bad. Would not buy again. Butter off going to store where you can see packages are all in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Rita Marianna

customer_reviews.title: No more orange crumbs
customer_reviews.text: I always had to consider where I would be eating Cheetos because of the orange crumbs. At home I could lick my orange fingers but not in public. Plus I always had to find something to clean under my orange fingernails. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Hay

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love portion control packaging, so these were a no-brainer for me. The "simply" part is unnecessary- they taste really good. The Nacho Cheese Doritos are thinner than the non-organic, but still very good. I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Johnson

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT IS PAST EXPIRATION DATE
customer_reviews.text: We received our new Subscribe & Save Simply Cheetos crunchy today and all 34 snack size bags are past manufacturer visibily marked product Expiration Date- Super displeased & upset to say the least! This absolutely should've been flagged by quality control prior to shipping. This is the 1st of 3 Simply by Frito Lay products we ordered, Now what do I do? I will absolutely be calling Frito Lay directly! However, i hope this Amazon vendor product is effortlessly & promptly replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: tasty low-calorie snacks
customer_reviews.text: outside of the packaging nightmare (please recycle) these are an excellent idea for anyone counting calories or dealing with weight issues; the all-natural savory treats are a tasty way to snack that is slightly better for you than the alternatives and the popcorn more so because it provides fiber for your diet
customer_reviews.author: Craig B. Suide

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the white cheddar
customer_reviews.text: Not the biggest fan of the white cheddar. I'd much rather buy a bag of Pirates Booty as that white cheddar has better flavor. This just lacks flavor in a majority of the bags. I dont think I'd buy this variety pack again. But I would probably purchase a big bag of the flavors we do like.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria O

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: The price was great so I decided to give these a try. My favorite is the white cheddar Doritos. They taste amazing. I was very suprised at how good they all taste. Normally when a natural version of products you like come out they never taste as good. These taste even better! This purchase was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My perfect snack.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect portions and that awesome Cheetos natural flavor. What more could I ask for. Love that it’s half puffy and half crunchy making it perfect to split between my child and I.
customer_reviews.author: Joella Berkner

customer_reviews.title: Health conscious quick snack!
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering, these chips are very tastey. Good for a quick snack. Some are organic for the health conscious individual. I think Lays had your health in mind with these Doritos, cheetos, and chips. I ordered the Doritos and cheese puffs again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie-mae-pond

customer_reviews.title: Heads up, ONLY the Doritos are organic!
customer_reviews.text: This was a suggested item on Subscribe and Save and the title showing was organic Doritos... And showed 4 types of chips. Silly me for assuming ALL types were organic. Nope!
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Expired chips!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering these for school snack for quite sometime and the freshness has NEVER been an issue until this last box- I received them on March 2 and they have an expiration of March 10 AND I paid full price!
customer_reviews.author: busyliving

customer_reviews.title: well!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent choice of purchase. Perfect for all snack officionados and children of all ages; also great for those who are health conscious and careful of what they put into their bodies. Simply Smartfood comes with great variety of texture (puffs popped and chipped) as well taste (salted or cheesed), to accommodate for whatever munchies craving you might experience. I am very pleased with my purchase and am happy to recommend in the strongest terms.
customer_reviews.author: HaileyO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size of serving.
customer_reviews.text: The thing is even the large bags are hard to find in the store. I love these instead of potato chips. Just enough flavor to not overwhelm. I was excited to see them in individual bags. First of all they stay fresher and second, just the right size so you don’t over eat.
customer_reviews.author: roostershill

customer_reviews.title: Beware of expiration date
customer_reviews.text: These taste awesome! I could eat 5 bags at a time. ha. but the box I received expires less than 2 months from when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Great Chip Snack Combo
customer_reviews.text: My entire family loves this chip combo! Great for on the go or in house snacks. The flavor is amazing for these "Simply" products. Perfect for any chip lover looking for a little variety. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: KrysWal

customer_reviews.title: Please check expiration
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is not bad. Tastes alright. But a lot of the bags had clumped up salt/flavors. It wasn’t great. Also check the expiration date of the bags you get. Mine expired like a month after my purchase. Short shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Love that these are organic!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these on subscribe and save for kids lunches. I love that they are organic and have recommended them to others. They taste great and my kids like the variety.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Nelson

customer_reviews.title: A+++!
customer_reviews.text: It's just bags in a cardboard box. I mean there's no more presentation than that so..... But not complaining, I'd rather not pay for fancy packaging and get my product as cheep as this was, they were awesome! A+++!
customer_reviews.author: Kollean Gouyton

customer_reviews.title: Taste bad
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these many many times and they're usually good but this time I got them and it was the first time that I've been able to order them since the whole virus thing started and they taste horrible. I'm not going to bother sending them back because it just isn't worth it for what I paid but I just wanted you to know that they taste really bad and I eat these all the time this is the worst that I have ever tasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size portion
customer_reviews.text: How could I resist this deal on white cheddar cheese puffs? These are fair sized portions, the price per bag was a great deal, and they are very tasty!
customer_reviews.author: jody hodges

product_meta.title: Simply Lay's Sea Salted Thick Cut Potato Chips, 0.875 Ounce (Pack of 36)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Simply Lay's Sea SaltedSimply put, SIMPLY snacks have a great taste, with no artificial flavors or colors to get in the way. They’re the ones that make you feel good about sharing with the people you love most!
feature_bullets: Made with 3 ingredients: potatoes, sunflower oil and sea salt
No artificial colors, flavors or preservatives
Individual size bags are perfect for enjoying at home, at work or on the go

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
